struct.exostring:
first time player approaches from inside the village she initiates conversation
(Tar_Hendar at 0)
After player has heard first exchange. (Tar_Hendar at 1)

first time talked to and Hendar dead
Dialog Mission Statement: The first time the player approaches the gate from the interior of the village a conversation between the gatekeeper (OutcastMan045) and Hesther (OutcastWom043) will ensue as Hendar (OutcastMan046) runs for the gate with a Rakghoul in pursuit.
The player can offer to help Hendar and the gatekeeper will open the gate, or he can simply sit and watch as hendar is killed (4 rounds after Hendar reaches the gate if the player does not intervene, or instantly if the player refuses to open the gate).
If the player saves Hendar, he and Hesther thank the player and wander off. If Hendar dies, Hesther wanders off and reviles the player.
Exit points in conversation:
Exit stream 1: First time talked to either hendar or Hesther after hendar has been saved. Advances the plot global to 99 and makes Hesther and Hendar move to the village
Exit stream 2: Hendar is saved, player has already spoken to Hesther and Hendar once since then. They thank player and nothing happens.
Exit stream 3: If Hendar dies and the player speaks to Hesther she will reviled the player and walk to her standing in the village point.
Exit stream 4: Player has promised to save Hendar, guard opens gate. Player has 4 rounds to go through the gate or Rakghoul kills Hendar then runs off.
Exit stream 5: If player chooses to let Hendar die. Depending on the path the player can get a dark side hit.
Exit stream 6: If Hendar is being attacked and the gate is open Hesther urges the player through. Nothing happens script wise.
Exit Stream 7: When player first approaches gate from inside village, cutscene with Hesther, Hendar and guard runs. Dialog sets plot variable to Hendar being attacked.
return to their waypoints in the village
After player has heard first exchange. (Tar_Hendar at 1)
